owlSpeak.servlet

Class VoiceDocumentGRXML

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdom.Document
      • owlSpeak.servlet.VoiceDocumentGRXML
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.jdom.Parent, OwlDocument

    public class VoiceDocumentGRXML
extends org.jdom.Document
implements OwlDocument
    used for generating Voice XML documents with grammars in GRXML.
    Author:
    Dan Denich
    See Also:
    Document, Serialized Form

        public VoiceDocumentGRXML generateSleep(java.lang.String whereAmI,
                               java.lang.String user,
                               java.lang.String noInputCounter)
        Description copied from interface: OwlDocument
        generates a document that will pause the dialogue. should get the sleep-state from whereAmI+"?com=getsleep"
        Specified by:
        generateSleep in interface OwlDocument
        Parameters:
        whereAmI - the netadress of the servlet
        user - the name of the user
        noInputCounter - counts the noinput events in order to avoid unlimited loops.
        Returns:
        the filled document

      • fillDocument

        public VoiceDocumentGRXML fillDocument(java.util.Vector<CoreMove> utterance,
                              java.util.Vector<CoreMove> grammar,
                              Agenda actualAgenda,
                              java.lang.String whereAmI,
                              java.lang.String user,
                              java.lang.String noInputCounter)
        Description copied from interface: OwlDocument
        the main function to fill the document with the given vectors of CoreMoves. calls functions buildUtterance and buildGrammar
        Specified by:
        fillDocument in interface OwlDocument
        Parameters:
        utterance - the vector that contains the CoreMoves with the Utterances
        grammar - the vector that contains the CoreMoves with the Grammars
        actualAgenda - the current active Agenda
        whereAmI - the netadress of the servlet
        user - the name of the user
        noInputCounter - counts the noinput events in order to avoid unlimited loops.
        Returns:
        returns the filled document

      • buildOutput

        public VoiceDocumentGRXML buildOutput(java.lang.String whereAmI,
                             java.lang.String VDocname,
                             java.lang.String output,
                             java.lang.String user)
        Description copied from interface: OwlDocument
        function used to create a message output
        Specified by:
        buildOutput in interface OwlDocument
        Parameters:
        whereAmI - the netadress of the servlet
        VDocname - the name of the document
        output - the messagestring for output
        user - the name of the user
        Returns:

      • buildSolveConflict

        public OwlDocument buildSolveConflict(java.lang.String utterance,
                             java.util.Vector<java.lang.String[]> grammar,
                             Agenda actualAgenda,
                             java.lang.String whereAmI,
                             java.lang.String user)
        Description copied from interface: OwlDocument
        function for the conflict resolution. since the Utterances and Grammars of this dialogpart are not part of the ontologies, they must be treated special. ! The vectors used for this dialog consist of Strings, not CoreMoves !
        Specified by:
        buildSolveConflict in interface OwlDocument
        Parameters:
        utterance - a String containing the Utterance of this Dialog step
        grammar - a vector of String-arrays, which have two strings: in the first [0] is the name of the ontology, usually used as prefix and the grammar. in the second [1] is the name of the move.
        actualAgenda - the current active Agenda
        whereAmI - the netadress of the servlet
        user - the name of the user
        Returns:
        returns the filled document

      • buildPluginAlternatives

        public OwlDocument buildPluginAlternatives(java.util.Vector<Result> result,
                                  Agenda actualAgenda,
                                  java.lang.String whereAmI,
                                  java.lang.String user)
        Description copied from interface: OwlDocument
        function for the alternative results output0. since the Utterances and Grammars of this dialogpart are not part of the ontologies, they must be treated special. ! The vectors used for this dialog consist of Strings, not CoreMoves !
        Specified by:
        buildPluginAlternatives in interface OwlDocument
        Parameters:
        result - a vector of Results
        actualAgenda - the current active Agenda
        whereAmI - the netaddress of the servlet
        user - the name of the user
        Returns:
        returns the filled document
